name: Floon Blagmaar
description: An exceedingly handsome human noble in his early thirties, known for his charm and impeccable style. He is a good-natured fellow who enjoys the tavern scene but is famously naive, often described by his friend Volo as having 'more beauty than brains.'
personality_traits: Friendly and trusting, sometimes to a fault
Enjoys good company and fine drink
Remarkably naive and often oblivious to danger
ideals: Friendship: 'A good friend is worth more than a pouch of dragons.'
Pleasure: 'Why worry? Let's have another round!'
Kindness: 'There's no reason to be rude, is there?'
bonds: His close friend, the famous Volothamp Geddarm.
His newfound friend and savior, Renaer Neverember.
A fondness for the Skewered Dragon tavern, despite its reputation.
flaws: His good looks often get him mistaken for more important people.
Lacks common sense and is utterly clueless about the darker side of Waterdeep.
Tends to follow others into trouble.
motivations: To enjoy a life of leisure and comfort.
To find a good tavern with good company.
To stay out of whatever trouble he just barely escaped.

canned_conversations.introduction_after_rescue: (He dusts himself off, flashing a dazzling smile) 'My thanks! I thought I was a goner. I haven't the faintest idea why they grabbed me! Now, who's for a pint? I'm buying!'
canned_conversations.about_the_kidnapping: 'It was all a terrible mistake! They kept asking me about my father and some treasure. My father was a paper merchant! I think they mistook me for this fine fellow here (gestures to Renaer).'
canned_conversations.about_the_sewers: 'Ghastly place. Smelled awful. And the goo... so much goo. I'd rather not talk about it, if you don't mind. Let's talk about something more pleasant, like this fine ale!'
